resources.string:
Budget Planner for Freelancers is and will always be free. Furthermore, you'll never see ad here!

This is why our team (me, my girlfriend and dear users who support this app with donations) needs your help.
We will appreciate your help and will be glad to include you (or your brand) to the list of our sponsors below!\n\nThere are 3 types of sponsorship subscriptions:
Your name will appear in the sponsors list below.
